item.title: LINE Notify API: サンプルコード #18
item.description: #!/bin/bash # Configuration readonly TOKEN="mytoken" readonly MESSAGE="Hello, LINE Notify!" readonly EP="https://notify-api.line.me/api/notify" readonly AUTH="Authorization: Bearer ${TOKEN}" readonly CONTENT_TYPE="Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded" readonly DATA="message=${MESSAGE}" # API request curl -X POST -H "${AUTH}" -H "${CONTENT_TYPE}" -d "${DATA}" ${EP} import requests # Configuration token = 'mytoken' message = 'Hello, LINE Notify!' ep = 'https://notify-api.line.me/api/notify' headers = { 'Authorization': f'Bearer {token}', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' } payload = {'message': message} # API request r = requests.post(ep, headers=headers, data=payload) # Response print(r.

item.title: FTPファイルアップロードの自動化: サンプルコード #17
item.description: #!/bin/bash # FTP server settings SERVER="127.0.0.1" PORT="21" USER="username" PW="password" REMOTE_DIR="/public" # Temporary file TMP_FILE="tmp" touch $TMP_FILE # FTP command sequence FTP_COMMANDS=$(cat << EOF open $SERVER $PORT user $USER $PW passive prompt cd $REMOTE_DIR mput $TMP_FILE ls bye EOF ) # Run echo "$FTP_COMMANDS" | ftp -n

item.title: Bashで引数のハンドルと終了ステータスの取得: サンプルコード #16
item.description: #!/bin/bash if [ "$#" -ne 3 ]; then echo 'Error: The script expects exactly 3 arguments.' exit 1 fi echo 'The number of args is 3.' echo $1 echo $2 echo $3 echo 'Hello, world.' if [ "$?" -eq 0 ]; then echo 'Command succeed.' else echo 'Command failed.' fi

item.title: Bashで実行時間を計測: サンプルコード #15
item.description: #!/bin/bash BEGIN=$(date +'%s.%3N') # work sleep 10 END=$(date +'%s.%3N') DURING=$(echo "scale=3; ${END}- ${BEGIN}" | bc) echo "BEGIN: ${BEGIN}" echo "END: ${END}" echo "DURING: ${DURING}"
